chapters.title: Chapter 15:  A Different Skill
chapters.info:
Yurith Azeri,
      p. 336â€”Guardswoman
      in the Royal Palace in Caemlyn.  She and observed
      Merilille leaving the city with one of the
      Sea Folk apprentices, presumably Talaan.  She
      gives daily lessons in the sword to Elayne's
      bodyguard.  She is an excellent conversationalist and well-educated,
      but she is silent about her past.
